constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 169 (Tuesday, September 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. DINGELL:
H.R. 5396.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority of Congress to enact this
legislation is provided by Article I, section 8 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H5506]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

policyArea.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

title: Title IX Take Responsibility Act of 2021
